entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem display a page on Android and IOS #17242
  • Tabbar Selection Style Issues #17237
    .NET 8 GA
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #17236
  • Windows Debug - A cycle occurred while laying out the GUI #17234
    Backlog
  • [Android] PRISM absolute navigation changes app window and MainActivity is being recreated #17233
  • Back button image color can't be changed #17228
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Buttons sample on David's Control Gallery currently crashes on Windows #17225
    Backlog

Closed

  • Maui Hybrid App stuck on "Loading..." in release mode on Android. #16313
    8.0-rc2
  • Mac Catalyst Binding Project does not work with MAUI without manual edit of project file #17217
  • CollectionView Header & Footer not showing #14557
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - Shared ResourceDictionary Styles prevents app from building in android #16908
    .NET 8 GA
  • Mono.Debugging.Soft.DisconnectedException on Hotreload Crashes On Android #17227
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] - AndroidMessageHandler - Cannot access a disposed object #17129
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
  • [android] improve ToolbarExtensions.UpdateIconColor performance #17241
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes for Border on Windows #17239
  • Copy Windows assets to the output folder for Unpackaged #17238
  • [msbuild] fix NuGet Central Package Management (CPM) #17235
    area/single project ☝️, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Core Device Tests in CI #17232
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [net8.0] Compatibility should depend on Controls #17231
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] do not register srcinfo for xaml-defined values #17230
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Mac Catalyst Controls Device Tests in CI #17229
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • (Windows) Fix tabbar visibility test #17240
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Add View docs #17220
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, backport/suggested
  • Compatibility should depend on Controls #17226
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Update with internal flow #17216
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 GA
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    .NET 8 GA
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
